value:
I'd love to dig into some pumpkin
cake with the rest of the mercenaries.
That'd be something to remember!

I bet I could skewer a pumpkin with
an arrow! That'd count as practice,
right? Uncle Shinon might not agree...

Come on! Let's go to the festival!
We could bag a ton of treats if we
go together.

Can you imagine how great Mist
would look in a harvest festival
costume? I'd like to see that!

I could go and ask Boyd for candy,
but since I'm in costume... I might as
well pull a trick on him! Hee-hee!

Ooooo! Did I get ya? Don't worry!
I'm here to deliver a harvest festival
treat from $Nf!
Look at all this CANDY!

I'm a pretty spooky ghost!
Aren't I?
My tricks just aren't landing!

Just what I wanted—a harvest
festival treasure!

I'm Rolf, a member of the Greil Mer—
er, no...a spooooky ghost! You better
get yourself ready for some tricks!

Hey, $Nu...$k$pCheck out this haul! Have you EVER
seen this much candy in one place?$k$pThe harvest festival is way too much
fun! I can dress up as a ghost, and
they give me CANDY too? Woo!$k$pI never would have imagined that
this much fun was even possible...$k$pIf peace came to the world, we could
enjoy festivals like this whenever we
wanted to, couldn't we?$k$pI'll lend you whatever strength I've
got!$k$pTill this time next year, that is—I'll
need a short break, of course. That
candy won't collect itself!
えーい！
甘いよ！
くっ…
Can't be...
Wanna see a trick?
Candy, please!
This is a treat!
Woooooh!
Now I'm a ghost...
laugh
A festival where people just give candy away? Yeah, this is the best!
Whoa! Oh! *chuckle* You scared me! Looks like you're the real trickster...
What do you think? Do I look like a real ghost?
Hold on for just a minute... I'm playing a trick on my brothers!
D'ya think Shinon will give me candy? Hmm... I dunno...
I wish there was a festival like this in my world too...
I've got some treats to share... The biggest slice of pumpkin cake is for you!
Think I'll scare 'em?
There's candy, right?
More fun!
